gen2.Polka Dot Bow: Raises power of Normal moves by 10%.
gen2.Quick Claw: Each turn, holder has a ~23.4% chance to move first in its priority bracket.
gen2.Scope Lens: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
gen2.Silver Powder: Raises power of Bug-type moves by 10%.
gen2.Stick: If held by a Farfetch'd, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)
gen2.Thick Club: If held by a Cubone or a Marowak, its Attack is doubled.
gen2.Water Stone: Evolves Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, Shellder into Cloyster, Staryu into Starmie, Eevee into Vaporeon, Lombre into Ludicolo, and Panpour into Simipour when used.
